DOC.brief_summary: More 29 million people US live diabetes , many develop diabetic retinopathy ( DR ) diabetic eye disease ( DED ) , lead cause vision loss blindness working-age adult . Annual eye screen recommend diabetic patient since vision loss prevent laser photocoagulation anti-VEGF injection DR diagnose early stage . Currently , number clinical personnel train DR screen order magnitude small need screen large , grow diabetic population . Therefore , meet large unmet need DR screening , fully-automated computerized DR screening system necessary . This study design assess performance EyeArt , automate DR screen tool .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Assessment EyeArt Automated Diabetic Retinopathy Screening Tool
